caption:
Long RV travel days = everyone’s least favorite, right? But what if we told you some RVers actually look forward to travel days?⁠ Here's how to make it happen:

1️⃣ Divide and conquer responsibilities
2️⃣ Don't rush the process; make the most of the journey from point A to point B
3️⃣ Stop as often as you need to
4️⃣ Use the time on the road to connect and make memories together
5️⃣ Keep your travel under 5-hours, arriving with plenty of time to set up and relax

What would you add to this list to make travel days as enjoyable as possible?

For more RV travel tips, check out the link in our bio before your summer adventures.

Featured #THORAmbassadors: @thestoleys
Featured RV: @keystonervcompany Carbon
